ticket.title: Conflict with "Deprecated" gem
ticket.original-body:
Hi,
I am using Rails 3 RC and "DBI" Gem, that require "Deprecated" gem...
But when Activerecord use a 'deprecate' method, AR use the 'deprecate' method of 'deprecated' gem...resulting in a app error
You did not specify how you would like Rails to report deprecation notices for your development environment, please set config.active_support.deprecation to :log at config/environments/development.rb /Users/raphael/.rvm/gems/ree-1.8.7-2010.02@rails3/gems/deprecated-2.0.1/lib/deprecated.rb:176:in `instance_method': {:subclasses=>:descendants} is not a symbol (TypeError) from /Users/raphael/.rvm/gems/ree-1.8.7-2010.02@rails3/gems/deprecated-2.0.1/lib/deprecated.rb:176:in `deprecate' from /Users/raphael/.rvm/gems/ree-1.8.7-2010.02@rails3/gems/activerecord-3.0.0.rc/lib/active_record/base.rb:291 from /Users/raphael/.rvm/gems/ree-1.8.7-2010.02@rails3/gems/activerecord-3.0.0.rc/lib/active_record/railtie.rb:28 from /Users/raphael/.rvm/gems/ree-1.8.7-2010.02@rails3/gems/activesupport-3.0.0.rc/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:219:in `call' from /Users/raphael/.rvm/gems/ree-1.8.7-2010.02@rails3/gems/activesupport-3.0.0.rc/lib/active_support/dependencies.rb:219:in `to_proc' from /Users/raphael/.rvm/gems/ree-1.8.7-2010.02@rails3/gems/railties-3.0.0.rc/lib/rails/railtie.rb:180:in `each' from /Users/raphael/.rvm/gems/ree-1.8.7-2010.02@rails3/gems/railties-3.0.0.rc/lib/rails/railtie.rb:180:in `load_console' from /Users/raphael/.rvm/gems/ree-1.8.7-2010.02@rails3/gems/railties-3.0.0.rc/lib/rails/application.rb:154:in `load_console' from /Users/raphael/.rvm/gems/ree-1.8.7-2010.02@rails3/gems/railties-3.0.0.rc/lib/rails/application/railties.rb:11:in `each' from /Users/raphael/.rvm/gems/ree-1.8.7-2010.02@rails3/gems/railties-3.0.0.rc/lib/rails/application/railties.rb:11:in `all' from /Users/raphael/.rvm/gems/ree-1.8.7-2010.02@rails3/gems/railties-3.0.0.rc/lib/rails/application.rb:154:in `load_console' from /Users/raphael/.rvm/gems/ree-1.8.7-2010.02@rails3/gems/railties-3.0.0.rc/lib/rails/commands/console.rb:26:in `start' from /Users/raphael/.rvm/gems/ree-1.8.7-2010.02@rails3/gems/railties-3.0.0.rc/lib/rails/commands/console.rb:8:in `start' from /Users/raphael/.rvm/gems/ree-1.8.7-2010.02@rails3/gems/railties-3.0.0.rc/lib/rails/commands.rb:23 from script/rails:6:in `require' from script/rails:6

version.title: Conflict with "Deprecated" gem

version.body: I think this should be fixed in the Deprecated gem. If you would like you can try writing a patch for this, this should help http://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994/sending-patches — but until then I'm going to close the ticket.
version.body-html: I think this should be fixed in the Deprecated gem. If you would like you can try writing a patch for this, this should help http://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994/sending-patches — but until then I'm going to close the ticket.
version.title: Conflict with "Deprecated" gem
